languages.text: {n}Идира пристально смотрит на лексмеханика.{/n} "Шепотки вокруг тебя вьются, цепляются, да не липнут насовсем... может, еще все и будет, а может, и не будет вообще..."
{n}Idira peers at the Lexmechanic.{/n} "The whispers are dancing around you, latching onto you but not for long... Maybe it will happen yet, maybe it won't at all..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира пристально смотрит на лексмеханика.{/n} "Шепотки вокруг тебя вьются, цепляются, да не липнут насовсем... может, еще все и будет, а может, и не будет вообще..."

languages.text: {n}Idira observe le lexmécanicien attentivement.{/n} « Les murmures dansent autour de vous, ils s'accrochent à votre corps sans s'y attarder... Peut-être que ça se produira, et peut-être pas... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira peers at the Lexmechanic.{/n} "The whispers are dancing around you, latching onto you but not for long... Maybe it will happen yet, maybe it won't at all..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira observe le lexmécanicien attentivement.{/n} « Les murmures dansent autour de vous, ils s'accrochent à votre corps sans s'y attarder... Peut-être que ça se produira, et peut-être pas... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは法技術者を見つめる。{/n}「囁く者たちがあなたの周りで踊っているわ。あなたにしがみついているけれど、そう長くは続かないでしょうね…もしかしたら、それでも起きるかもしれえないし、全く起きないかも知れない…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira peers at the Lexmechanic.{/n} "The whispers are dancing around you, latching onto you but not for long... Maybe it will happen yet, maybe it won't at all..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは法技術者を見つめる。{/n}「囁く者たちがあなたの周りで踊っているわ。あなたにしがみついているけれど、そう長くは続かないでしょうね…もしかしたら、それでも起きるかもしれえないし、全く起きないかも知れない…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉凝视着思律机僧。{/n}“低语在你周围跳舞，紧紧抓住了你，但不会太久……或许会发生，又或许不会发生……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira peers at the Lexmechanic.{/n} "The whispers are dancing around you, latching onto you but not for long... Maybe it will happen yet, maybe it won't at all..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉凝视着法律技工。{/n}“低语在你周围跳舞，紧紧抓住了你，但不会太久……或许会发生，又或许不会发生……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt den Lexmechanicus an.{/n} "Das Geflüster tanzt um Euch herum, es heftet sich an Euch, aber nur kurz ... Vielleicht wird es noch geschehen, vielleicht nicht ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira peers at the Lexmechanic.{/n} "The whispers are dancing around you, latching onto you but not for long... Maybe it will happen yet, maybe it won't at all..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira blickt den Lexmechanicus an.{/n} "Das Geflüster tanzt um Euch herum, es heftet sich an Euch, aber nur kurz ... Vielleicht wird es noch geschehen, vielleicht nicht ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira mira fijamente al lexmecánico.{/n} «Los susurros bailan a tu alrededor. Se aferran a ti, pero no por mucho tiempo. Tal vez suceda, tal vez no...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira peers at the Lexmechanic.{/n} "The whispers are dancing around you, latching onto you but not for long... Maybe it will happen yet, maybe it won't at all..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira mira fijamente al lexmecánico.{/n} «Los susurros bailan a tu alrededor. Se aferran a ti, pero no por mucho tiempo. Tal vez suceda, tal vez no...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, Lexmekanik'e bakıyor.{/n} "Fısıltılar şu an için etrafında raks ediyor, sana tutunuyor... Belki henüz olmamıştır, belki de hiç olmayacaktır..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira peers at the Lexmechanic.{/n} "The whispers are dancing around you, latching onto you but not for long... Maybe it will happen yet, maybe it won't at all..."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, Lexmekanik’e bakıyor.{/n} “Fısıltılar etrafında raks ediyor, sana tutunuyor ama bir an için... Belki henüz olmamış, belki de hiç olmayacak...”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
